mdRecord.dcterms:description: During the 1950s and 1960s the building was identified by a large "Kemper Insurance" sign, although it was not that company's headquarters. In 1993, the Lyric Opera of Chicago purchased the opera house facilities in the building it had rented for 64 years. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Civic_Opera_Building [work]
